description: LibreTranslator a translator based on LibreTranslate Features: - translate your text into up to 16 languages - 5 different themes - share translation easily from the app - completely open source - more coming... Supported languages (UI): - English - German - French - Polish - Portuguese (Brazil) - Russian - Turkish Supported languages (translation): This depends on the LibreTranslate instance. Translation: The LibreTranslate API is used for the translation. LibreTranslate is licensed under AGPLv3. Wiki: In the Wiki you can find a short UI explanation to get started. Licensing: Licensed under the EUPL-1.2. OpenSource: This app is open source.
